name: Last Minute Chicken Dinner
author: HILROY
summary: This is great for those crazy days when you lose track of time. It's a wonderful, one pot meal in under 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
2 cups frozen broccoli, carrots and cauliflower combination
directions: Heat oil in large frying pan over medium high heat
Cook potatoes, stirring frequently until tender-crisp
Stir in chicken, and cook until no longer pink
Stir in condensed soup, milk, onion, and garlic powder
Arrange vegetables on top, and sprinkle with parsley, marjoram and basil
Cover, and simmer over low heat until chicken is cooked through, and vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes
Remove from heat, and stir in Parmesan
